use fdisk to partition it first of all, is that working ok ?

you don't install onto fat
right, but i'm burning a "live cd" to usb? ... does that make a difference? or should I format it ext4?
you don't format it
you burn it as an image
fdisk is just for creating partitions
livesession is run from ram, it's not an install so not really easy to do, better to do an install

yes,
what difference does it make, as it doesn't install the "running" session, it installs a clean session
even if you clicked install from the desktop, it would be a clean install, nothing to do with what you had running at that moment in time
that is the most straight forward way
